newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU regrets Deng's death, praises contribution.
newsitem.headline: EU regrets Deng's death, praises contribution.

text.p: The European Union said on Monday that it regretted the death of China's paramount leader Deng Xiaoping and praised his contributions to his country's development.

"He stimulated economic development, raised the standard of living and prosperity of the Chinese population and played a large role in the opening up of China to the international community," it said in a statement.
Foreign ministers of the 15-nation bloc were to discuss later on Monday whether to back a resolution before the U.N. Commission on Human Rights expressing concern about human rights in China.
If endorsed, it would be the sixth year in a row that the EU has backed such a resolution.
